description.displayText: I have known Michelle for over 20 years.  She provided housekeeping for me and my family over the years.  Michelle's greatest attributes are you willingness to take on any job big or small with a positive attitude.  Michelle also has always demonstrated a warm and caring personality which makes her not only a great employee but a good friend.   I know Michelle would be a outstanding asset to any position where caring, compassion and hard work are involved.
description.originalText: I have known Michelle for over 20 years.  She provided housekeeping for me and my family over the years.  Michelle's greatest attributes are you willingness to take on any job big or small with a positive attitude.  Michelle also has always demonstrated a warm and caring personality which makes her not only a great employee but a good friend.   I know Michelle would be a outstanding asset to any position where caring, compassion and hard work are involved.

description.displayText: Michelle worked for me as a housekeeper and she was great! Always on time, never missed a day, polite, caring and knew what I needed before I even realized it! She was wonderful. I have a brain injury and I can't tell you how much I appreciated her help and guidance. I was very disappointed when I moved to Missouri and had to find another housekeeper. I still have not found anyone as helpful, dedicated, thorough and kind as Michelle. She would be a great asset to any company she chose to work for.  Don't miss this opportunity to have her work for your company.
